ygData.subject: RE: Some questions about Experience (off-topic)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... As I recall at GenCon Brad said it was basically (lvl/10 rounded down)* 5 for exp gaining range with the exception being the lower levels.  That would seem
ygData.messageBody:
>A level 31 friend reported getting experience grouped with a
>45, but not a 46. My guess is it caps out at a 16 level
>delta. That is, a level 35 player grouped with a level 50
>would get exp, but a level 34 would not. At the low end, a
>level 1 player will not get experience with a level 5 (4 level
>delta). Everything else in the middle is a gradual scale
>between these two deltas.

As I recall at GenCon Brad said it was basically (lvl/10 rounded down)* 5
for exp gaining range with the exception being the lower levels. That would
seem to fit the data. At 10-19 5 levels range. At 20-29, 10 lvls. 30-39,
15 lvls. The lower level person sets the range apparently. Presumably then
at 40-49, 20 levels which might be verifiable if the level limit gets
raised.

Kitasi
